transcript:
Customer: Hello

Executive: Hello

Customer: Hello

Executive: Good evening mam, Rithika from IndiaMART lending. Sollunga.

Customer: Discuss pannigala mam?

Executive: Pannonga.

Executive: Sir edho email send pandra abdinnaaru. So email create pannittu irukkom.

Executive: Vera edhum pesinangala mam? Enakku theriyala mam endru sonnanga enakku. So edho unga kitta kekkalamnu call pannen.

Customer: Illanga mam innum poittu thaan irukku. Avanga edho sir solution ketrukaaru. Sir vandhu solution paathuttu next call connect pandrennu sollirukanga.

Executive: Appdingala? Okay okay. Mudiyuradhu okay thaan mam ellam clear ah irundhuchaa illa edhum illa innum indha question kku answer kidaikkalannu irundhuchaa?

Customer: Enna ippo naan

Executive: Sollunga sollunga sollunga.

Customer: Enakku theriyalaenga. Enakkenna avar solution ketta oru, enna avar thaan final deciding idhu. So indha maari solution ketrukaanga sir kitta pesittu.

Executive: Okay.

Customer: Adhanaala avaru innum maybe innoru solution koduthaaru. Adhu konjam sir kku okay vaa irundhudhunaa maybe proceed pannuvangannu ninaikkiren.

Executive: Okay okay. Edho mail edho send panna sollirundhaanga. But aanaa adhukkellaam avarukku meeting vandhuduchu. Enakku sonnanga avanga adhaavadhu paathu irundhuttaanga mail idhu onnu track pannalaam abdinnaanga. Seri okay. Adhukku appuram call vandhathum naan adhukku appuram vandhuten. So unga kitta kekkuradhu innum better ah irukkumnu unga kitta kettuten.

Customer: Oh okaynga okay.

Executive: Okay innoru vishayam enna mam nammalukku oru eight buyleads vandhu not relevant mark pannirukkom namma.

Customer: Aamanga.

Executive: So andha buyleads vandhu ippo again repeated ah adhu maari varudhaa illa eppdi mam paathu irukkeenga?

Customer: Illanga innum vandhuttu thaan irukken. Naan innum not relevant. Innaikku kooda rendu moonu leads not relevant potrundhen.

Executive: Seri. So appdi andha maari varudhunnaa namma product oda categories la edhum add aayirukkaannu check pannunga.

Customer: Aama.

Executive: One second.

Executive: Sari. Mmm. Appo address? Address naan anuppikkiren. Okay.

Customer: Sollunga mam.

Executive: Ippo mustard oil vandhu namma pannala.

Customer: Correct thaan mam.

Executive: Aama aama.

Executive: Castor oil illannu.

Customer: Castor oil pannala.

Executive: Okay. So aanaa adhukku repeated ah again vandhuttu irukkaa illa stop aayirukkaa? Ingae almost eight buyleads stop pannirukkom.

Customer: Illa enakku vandhuttu thaan irukken. Because naan day before yesterday kooda irrelevant leads mark pannen. But vandhu innaikkum kaaminchunaalathaan again adha vandhu naan not relevant irrelevantnu solli mark pannen.

Executive: Okay. Ippo namma pandra products vandhu coconut milk powder, coconut flour flour. So virgin coconut oil.

Customer: Aama. Naan oru dispatch la irukkenga. Naan ungalukku appuram naalaikku call pandreengala?

Executive: Naalaikkunga mam. Seri okay. Call back pannunga.

Customer: Ungalukku actually andha call ah connect aanaavanga ungaloda manager ah illa enna designation avanga?

Executive: Aama. Aama avangala manager relationship manager avanga.

Customer: Oh relationship manager kkum ungalukkum enna difference?

Executive: Actually vandhu ippo avanga kitta almost vandhu oru 15 to 20 members work pannuvanga.

Customer: Ungalukku avar senior aa?

Executive: Yes. Senior manager senior avanga.

Customer: Sorry kekkala. Ungalukku vandhu ungalukku manager avanga. Neenga avangalukku report pannuveengala?

Executive: Yes yes mam.

Executive: So avanga senior account manager avanga. Adhaavadhu namma accounts paathuttu irukkirom illaiyaa. Indha maari four years ah naan irukken. So naan senior account manager. Enakku same maari enakkitta oru two to three members work pannuvaanga.

Customer: Okay okay. Andha maari.

Customer: Okay mam. Neenga vandhu avarukku oru 10 to 15 minutes avarukku report pandra maari irukkum.

Executive: Aama yes mam.

Customer: Okay mam okay. 10 to 15 members indha maari oru senior account manager irundhaa avangalukku report pannuvaanga.

Executive: Oh okay mam okay.

Executive: So adhanaala naan ippo adhanaala add pannala naan. Group laiye so namma mattum discuss pannitte irundhaa theriyaadhu IndiaMART team kkum theriyaadhu.

Customer: Correct.

Executive: Reason naala thaan avangala naan add pannadhu. Illa abdinnaa namma discuss pannidalaam. Idhu appdiye continue aayitte irukkathukku namma edhume adhishtam level kke pogamudiyala. So adhanaala thaan add pannen. Neenga mail onnu vandhunnradha naan kekkiren mam. Adhai naan kettuttu enna mail send pannumo naan pannren. Neenga enakku free aayittu naalaikku morning onnu call back pannunga.

Customer: Okaynga. Neenga first enakku mail send pannunga. Naan adhukku appuram vandhu ungalukku call.

Customer: Okaynga. Thank you.

Executive: Thank you thank you mam.

Executive: Okay mam.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer is receiving irrelevant buyleads.

- Customer wants to know the mail sent by executive.



Resolution:

- Executive asked to check product categories.

- Executive will check and inform about the mail.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will send the mail to customer.

- Customer will call back executive tomorrow morning.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, product category, subscription, manager
